modShortDescription: Adds the "box" that allows the user to lock slots so they won't be moved OR sorted. Also adds one to vehicle inventory that does the same thing.
modDescription:
Adds the “box” that allows the user to lock [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/) so they won’t be moved OR sorted. Also adds one to vehicle inventory that does the same thing.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Updated for A20!
* Updated to move the box + arrows to the left of the sort button so it doesn’t overlap the “clear inventory” button.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-LockableInvSlots)** for A20  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-LockableInvSlots)** for A19

If you appreciate KhaineGB’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
